name: Thinking With Skateboards
description:
As a stream challenge, I gave myself 2 streams to try and take 2 random project templates I bought together for less than $10 on a sale, and combine them into a somewhat playable game. I think I succeeded.

Introducing Thinking with Skateboards, a... game, where you try to get a high score on the skating course, but alongside regular skateboarding, you can also use a portal gun! I have absolutely no idea what all you can do with this. Please, surprise me. 

This is not a real game in full development, and I have no intention at this point in time in turning it into a Real Game, but if I were to try that, I would probably not rely on the Unreal Marketplace resources I used.

If you wanna be there  the next time I do a weird design stream like that, follow me on twitch.tv/dnallohleoj. This is not my business itch page and I do not accept donations through here, you'd have to go to ko-fi.com/dnallohleoj for that.

And, credit where it's due, these are the Marketplace resources I used:

A Basic Skateboard Kit: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/basic-skateboard

Portal Gun/Portals: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/portal-gun-01

Stylized Character Kit: Casual 01: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/stylized-male-character-k...

The thing I used as a portal gun is a free model from kenney.nl/

Some textures were free samples from  gametextures.com/
